synopsis.text: Expanding the Pokémon universe, "Pokémon Concierge" invites you to a serene paradise where Pokémon and their trainers can unwind and rejuvenate. The story revolves around Haru, a dedicated concierge at the 'Pokémon Resort,' who embarks on a new journey after leaving behind her stressful corporate life. Alongside her cheerful manager, Watanabe, and other staff members like Tyler and Alisa, Haru learns the true essence of companionship and relaxation as she interacts with various Pokémon and their owners who visit the resort. Produced in collaboration with Netflix and featuring delightful stop-motion animation by dwarf studio, this series promises a unique and engaging experience for all Pokémon fans.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
